name: Lumberjack (TwoHorns)
description:
A survival game where you are a lumberjack with a handy axe. Fight monsters and try to survive the harsh winter. You derive your power from your camp fire. Blue flames will heal you whereas red flames will give you more power. You decide what power you choose to survive. Defeat ogre boss to win the game. Goodluck! 

PS: The downloadable version has better quality and light dynamics.
